qas.question: ______ In both liquid and gas form can fastly result in an exlposion.
To ensure safety of future space missions Oxygen was used at _____ of the normal pressure.
To reduce the chances of combustion ___ is required for safely handeling pure O.

answers.text: special training to ensure that ignition sources are minimized

qas.question: What will concentrated oxygen greatly speed up?
Because of the danger inherent in concentrated oxygen, what is a concern about keeping it?

answers.text: ensure that ignition sources are minimized
special training to ensure that ignition sources are minimized

qas.question: What does the transport and storage demand for safety in dealing with oxygen?

answers.text: special training to ensure that ignition sources are minimized
